resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105805</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105805</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206470</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Precious Drops: The Value of Water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kostbare Tropfen: Der Wert des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Baisses Précieuses : La valeur de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gotas Preciosas: O valor da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gocce Preziose: Il valore di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολύτιμες απελευθερώσεις: Η αξία του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gotas Preciosas: El valor del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers students the chance to learn the value of water by reading stories by Peace Corps Volunteers in Kenya and Ghana. They compare their own community to what they learn from reading.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angebotkursteilnehmer die Wahrscheinlichkeit, den 
Wert des Wassers durch lesengeschichten durch Friedenskorpse zu 
erlernen erbietet sich in Kenia und in Ghana freiwillig. Sie 
vergleichen ihre eigene Gemeinschaft mit, was sie vom Messwert 
erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'offres la chance d'apprendre la 
valeur de l'eau par des histoires de lecture par des corps de paix 
offre au Kenya et au Ghana. Ils comparent leur propre 
communauté à ce qu'ils apprennent de la lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ofertas a possibilidade aprender
o valor da água por histórias de leitura por corpos de paz 
oferecem-se em Kenya e em Ghana. Comparam sua própria 
comunidade a o que aprendem da leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di offerte la probabilità imparare il
valore di acqua dalle storia leggenti da Peace corpo si offre 
volontariamente nel Kenia e nel Ghana. Confrontano la loro 
propria Comunità a che cosa imparano da lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι σπουδαστές προσφορών η πιθανότητα να μαθευτεί η 
αξία του ύδατος με την ανάγνωση των ιστοριών από την ειρήνη 
προσφέρονται εθελοντικά Σώμα στην Κένυα και την Γκάνα. 
Συγκρίνουν την κοινότητά τους με αυτό που μαθαίνουν από 
την ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ofertas la ocasión de 
aprender el valor del agua por historias de lectura de los cuerpos de 
paz se ofrecen voluntariamente en Kenia y Ghana. Comparan a su 
propia comunidad a lo que aprenden de la lectura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206470</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105805</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/precious-drops-the-value-of-water</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
